link_desc:
Template for monitoring Prosody XMPP Server

Works with docker image prosody-docker-extended, should also works with classic Prosody installation (requires custom modules)

Installation instruction on the GitHub page

Items (12):

  • Connected Clients (Total / Availables / Aways / Chats / DND / Unavailables)
  • Stanzas (Incoming / Outgoing / Messages)

Graphs (2):

  • Clients
  • Messages
author: SimpleRezo
